text: This is a list of streams and rivers in Burkina Faso. Burkina Faso has three main rivers — the Black Volta, the Red Volta and the White Volta. Areas near rivers are affected by tsetse flies and simulium flies. ==A== * Atakora River ==B== * Banifing River * Béli River * Black Volta ==K== * Komoé River ==O== * Oti River ==R== * Red Volta ==S== * Sirba River ==T== * Tapoa River ==V== * Volta River ==W== *White Volta ==References== Burkina Faso Burkina Faso Category:Geography of Burkina Faso
title: List of rivers of Burkina Faso
